root.name: Shark! Hunting the Great White
root.description: OverviewYou can dive into a underwater world of excitement, full of danger and is the home of the Great White Shark! You hunt various types of sharks, especially the great white!FeaturesTake hold of any of 9 powerful underwater weapons, then strap on any of 9 equipment items including air tanks, various high tech fins and choose from several wet or dry suits. You'll need the best gear you can find to make it through these waters.The game features more than eight of the most ferocious and deadly predators that ever stalked the seas, including the infamous Great White, the Tiger Shark, the Great Hammerhead, and many more. While doing your hunting job, Â you'll swim through seas filled with life, such as whales, turtles, dolphins, and many kinds of fish.
